body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following items belongs to the category described by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Excellently done! 宠物 chǒngwù means “pets,” and 狗 gǒu (dog) is definitely one of the most popular pets in the world!
body.incorrect: Almost. Listen to the word again, and then review all four single-character words in the choices, think about what they mean, and think about which one belongs to the word in the audio.

body.quiz: Which of the following is most likely an appropriate description of the word in the audio?
body.answer: 它喜欢鱼肉。 Tā xǐhuān yúròu.
options: 她有宠物。 Tā yǒu chǒngwù.
它是红色的。 Tā shì hóngsè de.
他很开朗。 Tā hěn kāilǎng.
body.correct: Fabulous job! 猫 māo means “cat,” and cats like fish in general. Therefore, the sentence 它喜欢鱼肉。 Tā xǐhuān yúròu. (It likes fish) is the most appropriate choice.
body.incorrect: Not quite…listen again several times, and think about what the word means. Read through the descriptions carefully to see which one is most suitable to describe the animal said in the audio.

body.quiz: Which of the following words does not belong in the same group as the word in the audio?
body.correct: YYou got it! 继母 jìmǔ means “stepmother,” and in the same household there can be stepdad, son, and daughter, while 朋友 péngyǒu (friend) does not fall in the same group.
body.incorrect: Oops… listen to the audio several more times to find out what it represents. Then think about what other roles can fall in the same group with it.
